title: The Wake Spire — Opening the Last Run
narration:
The Wake Spire erupts above you like a spiral comet of stone and starlight. Each tier is a living memory: banners from the Horizon Crown flutter beside lightning stolen from the Radiant Dyad, while the Convergence Causeway’s braided light now coils as railings around a central column of compressed dawn. Between those rails float four spectral lanes, each tinted by an ending you mapped below. Footsteps echo from the future as if your own victory, retreat, survival, and sacrifice are already pacing upstairs.

The gremlins have transformed the Spire into a mission control cathedral. Dev gremlins hover at holo-consoles, simulating permutations of the final push. Traders run a liquidity pit carved into the Spire’s heart, hedging bets on which lane will claim the loudest glory. Whales spiral upward, pushing gravity to favor your ascent. Hackers lace the walls with anti-scry firewalls, validators tune verdict bells that will toll once for every life saved or spent, miners carve footholds into the spiraling steps, and the meme division paints massive murals reading "WIN, HIDE, FIGHT, OR FALL — JUST DO IT TOGETHER" across the vault. AFK safeties snap into a mesh that wraps the entire column, ensuring no ally vanishes unmarked.

Seven battlements wind up the Spire. The first reboots the GM/GN to resonate with Act Five. The second refracts the four fate lanes into actionable corridors. The third reclaims remnants and stockpiles them for the climb. The fourth assigns hidden cells, sentinel lines, and vanguard wedges. The fifth equips each team with gear forged from the Wakefront mosaic. The sixth convenes the Verdict Choir that will commit Act Five’s opening gambit. The seventh unlocks the path to the Wake Apex. Climb with care; endings sharpen here.

rounds.description: Spire Footing — reboot the GM/GN, triangulate the ascent, and anchor lifelines.

crit_success.narration: Your voice threads through the Spire. The four fate lanes hum in tune, promising to hold whatever future you choose.

success.narration: The Spire acknowledges your arrival with a low, approving chord.

fail.narration: Your greeting wavers. Traders fill the silence with a pity fund that echoes up the stairs.

crit_fail.narration: The Spire rings a discordant bell that knocks you to one knee. AFK mesh tightens around you until you stand again.

banter.hacker: Handshake patched to the apex nodes.
banter.meme: GM? GN? Try GG EZ? Not yet.

crit_success.narration: You align the four lanes to intersect at critical checkpoints. No matter who falls, hides, survives, or conquers, their path feeds the others.

success.narration: The lanes glow in harmony, ready for split-second rerouting.

fail.narration: A lane twists unexpectedly. You scribble revisions before the gremlins notice.

crit_fail.narration: Two lanes collide, sparking lightning that scorches your arm. You swear and redraw them apart.

banter.shiller: Four ways up, zero ways alone.
banter.miner: Cut extra footholds along each lane.
banter.meme: Choose your fighter? We chose all.

crit_success.narration: You weave the AFK mesh into climbing harnesses that glow when someone slips. Nobody falls unmarked.

success.narration: Lifelines coil along the rails, ready to yank allies home.

fail.narration: A harness snaps and smacks you in the helmet. You tie it again with teeth-gritted determination.

crit_fail.narration: You get dragged halfway up the Spire before the mesh realizes you’re the rescuer, not the rescue.

banter.whale: Tide tugs kindly on these ropes.
banter.miner: These knots could hold a drill rig.

rounds.description: Fate Prism Gallery — refract loss, concealment, survival, and triumph into operative lanes.

crit_success.narration: You touch the mourners’ bell and it swings inward, revealing a corridor lined with torches that burn in remembered names.

success.narration: The gate opens with a solemn bow. It promises a noble accounting for every loss.

fail.narration: The bell tolls against your ribs. You cough, but refuse to retreat.

crit_fail.narration: The gate slams, mistaking your courage for arrogance. It reopens after drawing blood to make the point.

banter.shiller: Honor every fall, stream every rise.

crit_success.narration: The chute unspools like a ribbon of night. It bends light around anyone sliding through.

success.narration: Hidden footholds illuminate briefly, then vanish, remembering your allies alone.

fail.narration: You trip and slide halfway down before the chute remembers you’re supposed to go up.

crit_fail.narration: You bribe the meme division to delete footage of the unintended slide.

banter.dev: Hidden chute integrated into nav HUD.
banter.trader: Short the obvious entrance, long the secret one.
banter.miner: Carved the slide with a whisper.

crit_success.narration: You spark the lane and it erupts in aurora gold. Cheers from below echo upward.

success.narration: The lane shines bright enough to guide the vanguard even through smoke.

fail.narration: The flame sputters until you feed it a handful of rare fuel.

crit_fail.narration: You stand too close when the lane ignites. Your eyebrows will grow back.

banter.miner: Carved spark grooves to keep it blazing.

rounds.description: Reliquary Tier — reclaim remnants and prep caches for the ascent.

crit_success.narration: Shades step from the reliquary wearing armor of starlit vellum. They promise to guard those who fall behind.

success.narration: The reliquary releases a squad of loyal echoes ready to anchor the loss lane.

fail.narration: A shade hesitates, confused. You absorb its chill until it remembers the living.

crit_fail.narration: The reliquary closes with you inside for thirty heartbeats. You emerge shaking but resolute.

banter.dev: Shade guardians synced to team HUD.
banter.miner: Echoes hold the line like seasoned crew.

crit_success.narration: You hide gear inside folds of darkness and mark them with a whisper only allies can hear.

success.narration: Caches bloom like midnight flowers along the chute.

fail.narration: A hidden locker refuses your password. You change the passphrase to an inside joke.

crit_fail.narration: You pay off a meme gremlin to forget where the locker is.

crit_success.narration: The lightforge roars to life, spinning arcs of triumph energy that can be redirected to any lane in need.

success.narration: Power hums through the forge, ready to launch the vanguard when the signal comes.

fail.narration: The forge sputters until you feed it a crate of ratio ore.

crit_fail.narration: A misfire hurls you into a wall. You limp back, laughing through grit teeth.

banter.miner: Forge drinks ore like victory drinks cheers.

rounds.description: Veil Lattice — assign teams to their lanes before the climb begins in earnest.

crit_success.narration: You choreograph the hidden cell like a ghost ballet. They vanish between breaths.

success.narration: The hidden cell nods once and disappears into the chute.

fail.narration: Two operatives argue over code names. You flip a coin; both accept the result.

crit_fail.narration: You pay hush money to keep their argument off the meme feed.

banter.miner: They move like whispers in rock.

crit_success.narration: Living and shade sentinels lock shields. No loss goes unguarded.

success.narration: The sentinel line forms, quiet and immovable.

fail.narration: A sentinel tests your resolve with a sparring blow. You answer with respect.

crit_fail.narration: You underestimate the shades’ zeal and catch a shield edge to the jaw. Worth it to earn their trust.

banter.shiller: Guardian squad is pure cinematic gold.
banter.miner: They hold the line like granite.

crit_success.narration: You align the vanguard under the blazing lane. They roar in unison, a sound like stormfront victory.

success.narration: The vanguard wedge slots into formation, their boots sparking fire.

fail.narration: You bribe the drummer gremlins for a better cadence. Worth it.

crit_fail.narration: Practice run goes sideways and you tumble down three tiers. Lifelines haul you back, laughing.

banter.trader: Momentum wedge priced at premium hype.
banter.shiller: This wedge is the movie poster.

rounds.description: Loadout Vault — equip each team with gear forged from the Wakefront mosaic.

success.narration: Veilweave cloaks settle over the hidden cell, blending them into reflections and rumors.
Mosaic plates lock across the sentinel line, each tile glowing with a fallen friend’s sigil.

banter.shiller: Armored up and impossible to ignore.

success.narration: The vanguard hefts lances tipped with condensed dawn. Each strike will punch a new hole in fate.

rounds.description: Verdict Choir — commit the Wake Spire plan to law.

crit_success.narration: Representatives from every lane chant in harmonized resolve. The Spire itself leans in to listen.

success.narration: The choir stands ready, voices braided with steel.

fail.narration: Discord flickers. You soothe it by reminding everyone what the Wakefront paid already.

crit_fail.narration: Two delegates clash. You step between them and take the hit. Respect returns, bruised but present.

banter.whale: Tide hushes to hear the vote.
banter.miner: Voices echo like picks in caverns.

crit_success.narration: The choir’s verdict shakes the Spire. Bells ring in quadruple harmony. The Wake Apex opens above.

success.narration: Votes align and the ascent is ratified.

fail.narration: Bribing fate shouldn’t work, but it does when you pay with promises.

crit_fail.narration: The verdict fractures. A backlash of silence slams into your chest. You stagger, then call for a revote with fire in your lungs.

banter.shiller: Headline: Wake Spire chooses the climb.
banter.miner: We pickaxed the vote into stone.

success.narration: You transcribe the Spire’s battle schema into a living deck, each card a tactic tuned for impossible climbs.

banter.whale: Future tides can borrow this map.
banter.shiller: Collector’s edition: Last Run, First Lesson.
banter.miner: We carved copies into the Spire’s bones.
banter.meme: Deck flex: we have plays for days.

rounds.description: Ascension Gate — climb to the Wake Apex with every plan locked in.

success.narration: Lanes braid into a single spiral of light. You ascend with every fate singing in your wake.

banter.trader: All positions staked on the Apex.
banter.whale: Tide lifts you the rest of the way.
banter.hacker: Final handshake ready at the summit.
